text: The year 2009 is the eighth year in the history of Cage Warriors, a mixed martial arts promotion based in the United Kingdom. In 2009 Cage Warriors held 1 event, Cage Warriors 36: USA Destruction. ==Events list== {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="font-size:90%;" |- ! scope="col" | # ! scope="col" | Event Title ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Arena ! scope="col" | Location |- | align=center| 36 | Cage Warriors 36: USA Destruction | | | Orlando, United States |} ==Cage Warriors 36: USA Destruction== Cage Warriors 36: USA Destruction was an event held on January 30, 2009 in Orlando, United States. ===Results=== ==References== Category:Cage Warriors events Category:2009 in mixed martial arts
title: 2009 in Cage Warriors
